vista.graph
Class GEScaledLayout

java.lang.Object
  vista.graph.GEScaledLayout
All Implemented Interfaces:
GELayoutManager
public class GEScaledLayout
extends java.lang.Object
implements GELayoutManager

This interface provides methods for managing the layouts of BoundedComposite objects which contain other Bounded objects ( which may themselves be Composites). This would be the "Strategy" Pattern. This strategy object encapsulates the know how of laying out composites.

It is the responsibility of classses implementing this interface to query Bounded elements for their preferred sizes and lay them out accordingly. The GEContainer classes use this interface for laying out their children.

Version:
$Id: GEScaledLayout.java,v 1.1 2003/10/02 20:48:58 redwood Exp $
Author:
Nicky Sandhu (DWR).
See Also:
Bounded, BoundedComposite, GEContainer
